content: hat is almost closed stop here if you do not want the pointy top row 13 ch1 single_crochet around join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet row 14 ch1 single_crochet around join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet slip_stitch across the top of the scs to close the point fasten_off and weave in ends optional attachments for pointy top hat treble_crochet = treble_crochet = yo twice place hook through stitch and pull up a loop yo and work off loops 2 at a time until there is 1 loop on the hook half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet = yo place hook through stitch and pull up a loop yo and pull through all 3 loops on the hook single_crochet decrease = single_crochet decrease = place hook through stitch and pull up a loop place hook through next stitch and pull up a loop yo and pull through all 3 loops on the hook flower attach to pointy hat but finish off after row 13 when row 1 chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring row 2 chain 4 treble_crochet 3 times into the ring chain 4 single_crochet into the ring 5 times to form 5 petals leave a 6-8 tail to sew flower to hat place flower over the point and use a yarn needle to sew the flower to the hat propeller can be attached to a pointy hat or a hat without point row 1 ch4 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring row 2 chain 12 treble_crochet in 4th chain from hook 3 treble_crochet 3 double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet 3 single_crochet in ring twice to form propeller leave a 6-8 tail to sew propeller to hat place propeller on top of the hat in the center and use a yarn needle to sew it to the hat ball can be attached to a pointy hat or a hat without point row 1 chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring row 2 6 single_crochet into ring row
